sentences.english: Longer campaigns and crises, labors beyond all others.
sentences.chinese: 更久战役和危机，痛彻寰宇一切。

sentences.english: If you prefer capturing the world on film, take a photography vacation.
sentences.chinese: 如果你偏爱用底片捕捉寰宇风采，就参加摄影假期吧。

sentences.english: The second section is about the characteristics of compilation.
sentences.chinese: 《寰宇通志》在编纂方法上的特点。

definition: the sun and moon/day and month/every day and every month/season/life and livelihood
yin and yang/heaven and earth/the universe
the hidden and the visible/that which can be seen and that which cannot/darkness and light/night and day/wisdom and ignorance/evil and good/the living and the dead/men and ghosts
division of China during earliest dynasties/fig. ancient China/Kyūshū, southernmost of Japan's four major islands
Mercury in traditional Chinese astronomy/see also 水星[shui3 xing1]
Cangwu county in Wuzhou 梧州[Wu2 zhou1], Guangxi
